arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	followerNeyrelle = idActor
	
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigNeyBark1DeadEnd, followerNeyrelle)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	idVigo = idActor
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigNeyBark3, idVigo, followerNeyrelle)	
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	idVigo = idActor
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	
	
	--Plays at the POI After the ambush door opens
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigNeyBark4, followerNeyrelle, idVigo)
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigNeyBark5, idVigo, followerNeyrelle)
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idActorDetector, power_CaveIn)
	Hydra.Wait(2.0)
	
	
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	idVigo = idActor
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigNeyBark6, idVigo, followerNeyrelle)
	end	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, sWorldName)
	idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	
	-- Getting this Actor Group On Startup was not working. Getting them one phase later seems to resolve the issue. (FEN-216208) -Don
	tSpawners = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DE_CSD_OldMines_Ambush_Spawner")

	-- Vigo says "stick together, there's no telling what's in these tunnels"	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVigoBark5, idVigo, followerNeyrelle)
	end
end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
if not Hydra.ActorGizmoIsDoorOpen(idDungeonDoor) then
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idDungeonDoor, false)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoOperate(idDungeonDoor)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
		-- Define markers for Neyrelle to shimmy through wall
		markerLocHoleInspect = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocHoleInspect")[1]
		markerLocOtherSide = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocOtherSide")[1]
		markerLocDoorInspect = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocDoorInspect")[1]
		markerLocDone = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocDone")[1]
		markerLocHoleThrough = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocHoleThrough")[1]
			
		-- Define Marker links for gizmos
		gizmoDoorLocked = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupgizmoDoorLocked")[1]
		gizmoDoor = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupgizmoDoor")[1]
		gizmoHole = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupgizmoHole")[1]
		idDoorInvis = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "DOOR_INVIS")[1]
		
		-- Define Markers for Vigo to inspect Lift and Hole
		markerLocVigoInspectLift = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocVigoInspectLift")[1]
		markerLocVigoInspectHole = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AmbushGroupLocVigoInspectHole")[1]
		
		-- Hiding the hole gizmo cause it looks weird just sitting out there when we don't need it yet
		Hydra.ActorDisable(gizmoHole)
		
		-- Holdout Room Actors
		doorNeyrelle = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Neyrelle_Door")[1]
		doorDoneNeyrelle = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Neyrelle_DoorDone")[1]
		liftVigo = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Vigo_Lift")[1]
		idDoor = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Door_Unlocked")[1]

		-- Regrab followers
		idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
		followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
		
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
			-- Take Control of Vigo (no longer a follower)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idVigo, false)
			Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idVigo)
			
			-- Vigo follower becomes static and moves to lift to comment on it
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationConstantSpeed(idVigo, markerLocVigoInspectLift, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_RUN, true)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idVigo, markerLocVigoInspectLift)	
			Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idVigo)
		end
		
		-- Swap Vigo from follower to Static
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
			Hydra.ActorDelete(idVigo)
		end
		Hydra.ActorEnable(liftVigo)
		
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) then
			-- Take Control of Neyrelle (no longer a follower)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(followerNeyrelle, false)
			Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(followerNeyrelle)
		
			-- Neyrelle moves to inspect Door		
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(followerNeyrelle, markerLocDoorInspect, "NPC_RUN", false)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(followerNeyrelle, markerLocDoorInspect)
			Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(followerNeyrelle)
			Hydra.ActorDelete(followerNeyrelle)
			Hydra.ActorEnable(doorNeyrelle)
		end
		
		-- Vigo mentions "the lift is further below, we have to keep moving"
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convLiftBroken, liftVigo)
		Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convLiftBroken)
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	-- Play Conversation about door being locked
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(liftVigo) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(doorNeyrelle) then
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convApproachLockedGate, idActorPlayer, doorNeyrelle, liftVigo)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(doorNeyrelle) then
		-- Wait so Neyrelle says something about the wall as she runs over to it
		Hydra.QActorWait(doorNeyrelle, 0.5)

		-- Neyrelle moves to inspect hole		
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(doorNeyrelle, markerLocHoleInspect, "NPC_RUN", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(doorNeyrelle, markerLocHoleInspect)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(liftVigo) then
		-- Wait so Vigo says something about the wall as she runs over to it
		Hydra.QActorWait(liftVigo, 0.9)
	
		-- Vigo moves to inspect hole		
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(liftVigo, markerLocVigoInspectHole, "NPC_RUN", false)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(liftVigo, markerLocVigoInspectHole)
		
		Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convApproachLockedGate)
	end
	
	-- Uses this location for reference when determining how intense the collapsing should be as the player nears the exit
	idHoldoutLoc = gizmoDoor

	-- Hole Gizmo is Disabled
	Hydra.ActorDisable(gizmoHole)	

	for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tSpawners) do
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)

	-- if the callback count == 12, do the callout.
	if Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(153) == 12 then
		idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
		
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
			Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNeyScream, doorDoneNeyrelle, idVigo)
		end
	end

end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tSpawners) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, true)
	end
end

Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(doorNeyrelle) then
	-- Neyrelle moves to inspect hole		
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(doorNeyrelle, markerLocHoleThrough, "NPC_RUN", false)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(doorNeyrelle, markerLocHoleThrough)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(doorNeyrelle)
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(doorNeyrelle, 1.0)
end
	
-- Enable Neyrelle on the otherside of the door since she can't walk or traverse off of navmesh
Hydra.ActorEnable(doorDoneNeyrelle)

idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)

-- Vigo says "and there she goes"
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNeyrelleCrawls, idVigo)
end
	
-- This sets the Ambush
AmbushHoldoutKillCount = 0

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)	
	idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	idVigoEnd = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Hawe_Verge_Donan_Tomb_End")[1]

	MarkerEscapeHoleRunTo = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "groupMarkerEscapeHoleRunTo")[1]
	MarkerCaveIn01 = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "groupMarkerCaveIn01")[1]
	MarkerCaveIn02 = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "groupMarkerCaveIn02")[1]
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convMinesEscapeBark, followerNeyrelle, idVigo)
	end
	
	-- Take Control of Neyrelle and Vigo (no longer a follower)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(followerNeyrelle) then
		Hydra.QActorEnableAI(followerNeyrelle, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(followerNeyrelle)
		-- Run to exit and fade out
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationConstantSpeed(followerNeyrelle, MarkerEscapeHoleRunTo, Hydra.MOVE_RATE_RUN, false)
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(followerNeyrelle, 1.0)
	end
	
	-- Offsets Vigo by a couple of seconds so they're not stacked on the exit 
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convMinesEscapeBark)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVigo) then
		Hydra.QActorEnableAI(idVigo, false)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idVigo)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVigo, MarkerEscapeHoleRunTo, "NPC_RUN", true)
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convMinesEscape, idVigo)
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idVigo, 1.0)
	end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	idVigo = idActor
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(convMinesCaveIn01, idVigo)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	
	-- Play some extra cavein effects.  The initial wait is to make sure the vars exist
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(MarkerCaveIn01, power_CaveIn)
	Hydra.Wait(1.5)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(MarkerCaveIn02, power_CaveIn)

end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
idDoorInvis = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Frac_GV1_05_InvisDoor")[1]
	
	-- First we turn off the switch gizmo with door appearance
	Hydra.ActorDelete(gizmoDoorLocked)
	
	-- Enable Actual Door Gizmo
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idDoor)

	
	-- Wait a second for dramatic effect
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)
	Hydra.ActorDisable(markerLocDone)
	
	-- reinitilize followers
	idVigo = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(vigoFollowerSno)
	followerNeyrelle = Hydra.QuestGetFollower(neyrelleFollowerSno)
	
	-- Neyrelle says "I got it!" as the door unlocks
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNeyrelleFinished, idVigo)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convNeyrelleFinished)
	Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idVigo, convNeyrelleFinished)
		
	-- Wait a second for dramatic effect
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	
	-- Operate the door	
	Hydra.ActorGizmoOperate(idDoor)
	Hydra.ActorDelete(idDoorInvis)
